name: Kriegsberg
description:
Overview

Fight amongst the mountain tops of Kriegsberg! shooting down enemy planes and carpet bombing enemy anti air guns and tanks! survive as long as you can pilot! 

  • Retro / Oldschool
  • Bullet Hell 
  • 12 years and older

What is the objective?

In Kriegsberg the enemy is mobilising from both air and land, it's your job to send them back to their mothers in a neatly sealed, double wrapped gift box of DEATH! 

Set the highest score and inspire your fellow pilots to fight harder!

Controls 

WASD / arrow keys - Move

Space - Shoot

B - Bomb

Q - Polarity Shift

Escape - Pause
